mods.abstract: One color offset printing plate (red on silver) advertising Johnny Darrell and containing a biography of his life and accomplishments. The press release describes Darrell's move to Nashville, the start of his recording career, the type of songs he likes to record, his recording style, and his appeal. The plate contains the same information as version three but features a different photograph of Johnny Darrell.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
